name: Bulbasaur
desc: A dual-type Grass/Poison Pokémon. It's known for the plant bulb on its back.

name: Ivysaur
desc: The evolved form of Bulbasaur. Its bulb has grown into a plant.

name: Venusaur
desc: The final evolution of Bulbasaur. A large and powerful Grass/Poison type.

name: Charmander
desc: A Fire-type Pokémon with a flame at the tip of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
desc: The evolved form of Charmander. A Fire-type with a fiery attitude.

name: Charizard
desc: The final evolution of Charmander. A powerful Fire/Flying type.

name: Squirtle
desc: A Water-type Pokémon. Known for its water-filled shell.

name: Wartortle
desc: The evolved form of Squirtle. A Water-type with impressive defenses.

name: Blastoise
desc: The final evolution of Squirtle. A Water-type with powerful water cannons.

name: Caterpie
desc: A Bug-type Pokémon. Known for its silk-producing capabilities.

name: Metapod
desc: The evolved form of Caterpie. It's in a hardened cocoon-like state.

name: Butterfree
desc: The final evolution of Caterpie. A graceful Bug/Flying type.

name: Weedle
desc: A Bug/Poison type. Known for its sharp stinger.

name: Kakuna
desc: The evolved form of Weedle. It's in a hardened cocoon-like state.

name: Beedrill
desc: The final evolution of Weedle. A menacing Bug/Poison type.

name: Pidgey
desc: A Normal/Flying type. Often found in grassy areas.

name: Pidgeotto
desc: The evolved form of Pidgey. A swift and agile flyer.

name: Pidgeot
desc: The final evolution of Pidgey. A majestic Normal/Flying type.

name: Rattata
desc: A Normal type. Known for its sharp incisors.

name: Raticate
desc: The evolved form of Rattata. A swift and cunning Normal type.

name: Spearow
desc: A Normal/Flying type. Quick and agile in flight.

name: Persian
desc: A Normal type Pokémon. Known for its elegant and aloof demeanor.

name: Psyduck
desc: A Water type Pokémon. Often suffers from intense headaches.

name: Golduck
desc: The evolved form of Psyduck. A graceful Water type.

name: Mankey
desc: A Fighting type Pokémon. Quick to anger and very energetic.

name: Primeape
desc: The evolved form of Mankey. Fiercely aggressive and strong.

name: Growlithe
desc: A Fire type Pokémon. Known for its loyalty and courage.

name: Arcanine
desc: The evolved form of Growlithe. Majestic and powerful Fire type.

name: Poliwag
desc: A Water type Pokémon. Has a swirl pattern on its belly.

name: Poliwhirl
desc: The evolved form of Poliwag. Known for its tadpole appearance.

name: Poliwrath
desc: The evolved form of Poliwhirl. A Water/Fighting type known for its strength.

name: Abra
desc: A Psychic type Pokémon. Has strong psychic abilities but low stamina.

name: Kadabra
desc: The evolved form of Abra. Wields a silver spoon and has heightened psychic powers.

name: Alakazam
desc: The final evolution of Abra. A genius Psychic type with an IQ of 5000.

name: Machop
desc: A Fighting type Pokémon. Gains strength as it trains and evolves.

name: Machoke
desc: The evolved form of Machop. Often seen flexing its impressive muscles.

name: Machamp
desc: The final evolution of Machop. Boasts incredible strength and multiple arms.

name: Bellsprout
desc: A Grass/Poison type Pokémon. Has a plant-like appearance.

name: Weepinbell
desc: The evolved form of Bellsprout. Has a large, gaping mouth.

name: Victreebel
desc: The final evolution of Weepinbell. A carnivorous plant Pokémon.

name: Tentacool
desc: A Water/Poison type Pokémon. Known for its tentacle stingers.

name: Tentacruel
desc: The evolved form of Tentacool. Has a large number of tentacles.

name: Geodude
desc: A Rock/Ground type Pokémon. Often found in mountainous areas.

name: Graveler
desc: The evolved form of Geodude. Has four arms and is prone to rolling.

name: Golem
desc: The final evolution of Geodude. Extremely tough and powerful.

name: Ponyta
desc: A Fire type Pokémon. Known for its fiery mane and speed.

name: Rapidash
desc: The evolved form of Ponyta. A majestic Fire type with blazing speed.

name: Slowpoke
desc: A Water/Psychic type Pokémon. Known for its slow and absent-minded nature.

name: Slowbro
desc: The evolved form of Slowpoke. Gains increased psychic powers.

name: Magnemite
desc: An Electric/Steel type Pokémon. Magnetically attracted to metal objects.

name: Magneton
desc: The evolved form of Magnemite. Composed of multiple Magnemite units.

name: Farfetch'd
desc: A Normal/Flying type Pokémon. Rare and known for carrying a leek.

name: Doduo
desc: A Normal/Flying type Pokémon. Has two heads and runs at high speeds.

name: Dodrio
desc: The evolved form of Doduo. Known for its three heads and agility.

name: Seel
desc: A Water type Pokémon. Often seen basking on icebergs.

name: Dewgong
desc: The evolved form of Seel. Resides in cold seas and has excellent swimming skills.

name: Grimer
desc: A Poison type Pokémon. Appears slimy and is known for its stench.

name: Muk
desc: The evolved form of Grimer. Highly toxic and emits noxious gases.

name: Shellder
desc: A Water type Pokémon. Resembles a bivalve shell.

name: Cloyster
desc: The evolved form of Shellder. Has a hard, protective shell.

name: Gastly
desc: A Ghost/Poison type Pokémon. Appears as a shadowy, gaseous figure.

name: Haunter
desc: The evolved form of Gastly. Enjoys playing pranks on people.

name: Gengar
desc: The final evolution of Gastly. A mischievous and powerful Ghost type.

name: Onix
desc: A Rock/Ground type Pokémon. Known for its massive size and burrowing abilities.

name: Drowzee
desc: A Psychic type Pokémon. Induces sleep in others with its pendulum.

name: Hypno
desc: The evolved form of Drowzee. Has a pocket watch for hypnotic abilities.

name: Krabby
desc: A Water type Pokémon. Known for its large, powerful pincers.

name: Kingler
desc: The evolved form of Krabby. Possesses enormous and strong claws.

name: Voltorb
desc: An Electric type Pokémon. Resembles a Poké Ball and can explode.

name: Electrode
desc: The evolved form of Voltorb. Known for its explosive tendencies.

name: Exeggcute
desc: A Grass/Psychic type Pokémon. Composed of multiple eggs.

name: Exeggutor
desc: The evolved form of Exeggcute. Has a tall and slender appearance.

name: Cubone
desc: A Ground type Pokémon. Wears the skull of its deceased mother.

name: Marowak
desc: The evolved form of Cubone. A skilled user of the bone it carries.

name: Hitmonlee
desc: A Fighting type Pokémon. Known for its powerful kicking techniques.

name: Hitmonchan
desc: A Fighting type Pokémon. Throws punches at the speed of sound.

name: Lickitung
desc: A Normal type Pokémon. Has a long, stretchy tongue.

name: Koffing
desc: A Poison type Pokémon. Emits toxic gases and floats in the air.

name: Weezing
desc: The evolved form of Koffing. Known for its dual-headed appearance.

name: Rhyhorn
desc: A Ground/Rock type Pokémon. Covered in rocky armor.

name: Rhydon
desc: The evolved form of Rhyhorn. A powerful and imposing Pokémon.

name: Chansey
desc: A Normal type Pokémon. Known for its incredible egg-bearing pouch.

name: Tangela
desc: A Grass type Pokémon. Covered in tangled vines.

name: Kangaskhan
desc: A Normal type Pokémon. Protects its young in its pouch.

name: Horsea
desc: A Water type Pokémon. Known for its seahorse-like appearance.

name: Seadra
desc: The evolved form of Horsea. A formidable Water type.

name: Goldeen
desc: A Water type Pokémon. Has a golden body and is skilled at leaping.

name: Seaking
desc: The evolved form of Goldeen. Known for its powerful horn.

name: Staryu
desc: A Water type Pokémon. Resembles a star-shaped jewel.

name: Starmie
desc: The evolved form of Staryu. Possesses powerful psychic abilities.

name: Mr. Mime
desc: A Psychic type Pokémon. Known for its miming and barrier abilities.

name: Scyther
desc: A Bug/Flying type Pokémon. Has scythe-like blades for hands.

name: Jynx
desc: An Ice/Psychic type Pokémon. Uses seductive dancing in battle.

name: Electabuzz
desc: An Electric type Pokémon. Stores electricity in its body.

name: Magmar
desc: A Fire type Pokémon. Emits intense flames and heat.

name: Pinsir
desc: A Bug type Pokémon. Known for its powerful pincers.

name: Tauros
desc: A Normal type Pokémon. Highly aggressive and difficult to tame.

name: Magikarp
desc: A Water type Pokémon. Considered one of the weakest Pokémon.

name: Gyarados
desc: The evolved form of Magikarp. A fearsome Water/Flying type.

name: Lapras
desc: A Water/Ice type Pokémon. Known for its serene and gentle nature.

name: Ditto
desc: A Normal type Pokémon. Can transform into any other Pokémon.

name: Eevee
desc: A Normal type Pokémon. Known for its many evolution possibilities.

name: Vaporeon
desc: One of Eevee's evolved forms. Possesses water-based powers.

name: Jolteon
desc: One of Eevee's evolved forms. Emits electrical sparks.

name: Flareon
desc: One of Eevee's evolved forms. Has fiery fur and attacks.

name: Porygon
desc: A Normal type Pokémon. Composed of computer data.

name: Omanyte
desc: A Rock/Water type Pokémon. Resembles a prehistoric mollusk.

name: Omastar
desc: The evolved form of Omanyte. Possesses a spiral shell.

name: Kabuto
desc: A Rock/Water type Pokémon. Resembles a prehistoric arthropod.

name: Kabutops
desc: The evolved form of Kabuto. Known for its blade-like arms.

name: Aerodactyl
desc: A Rock/Flying type Pokémon. Resembles a prehistoric reptile.

name: Snorlax
desc: A Normal type Pokémon. Enormous and known for blocking paths.

name: Articuno
desc: A Legendary Ice/Flying type Pokémon. Known for its icy wings.

name: Zapdos
desc: A Legendary Electric/Flying type Pokémon. Emits powerful electricity.

name: Moltres
desc: A Legendary Fire/Flying type Pokémon. Produces intense flames.

name: Dratini
desc: A Dragon type Pokémon. Known for its serpentine body.

name: Dragonair
desc: The evolved form of Dratini. Possesses mystical powers.

name: Dragonite
desc: The final evolution of Dratini. A powerful Dragon/Flying type.

name: Mewtwo
desc: A Legendary Psychic type Pokémon. One of the most powerful.

name: Mew
desc: A Mythical Psychic type Pokémon. Said to contain the DNA of all Pokémon.
